industry: Instrument Manufacturing for Measuring and Testing Electricity and Electrical Signals
description: Teradyne brings high-quality innovations such as smart devices, life-saving medical equipment and data storage systems to market, faster. Its advanced test solutions for semiconductors, electronic systems, wireless devices and more ensure that products perform as they were designed. Its Industrial Automation offerings include collaborative and mobile robots that help manufacturers of all sizes improve productivity and lower costs. In 2019, Teradyne had revenue of $2.3 billion and today employs 5,500 people worldwide.
tags: Instrument Manufacturing for Measuring and Testing Electricity and Electrical Signals
